findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …) and updateEmissionRate() could invoke massUpdatePools() function, that can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: Wrong burning
findings.description: Sending tokens to the dead address instead of burning them in token contract, and transferring amount more than turtle balance is redundant.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to change critical contract parameters and perform sensitive actions.
